title: Hans-Martin Heyn
text:
I’m a senior lecturer at the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Gothenburg and Chalmers University of Technology in Sweden. My research concentrates around Software Engineering for AI and distributed cyber-physical systems. I’m especially interested in studying how we can set reasonable data requirements for training and run-time data and implement fault detection for AI based on runtime data. A research direction that triggered my interest for achieving these aims is causal modelling. I’m teaching the courses EDA344 / LEU062: Data Communication, DAT257: Agile Software Project Management, and DAT 550: Software Engineering for AI.
On this site I keep a list of my publications and my CV. Feel free to contact me if you have questions.
